data.text: @ArsenalDem we find drama in every age, but that shouldn't lead us to such relativism that we cannot compare/contrast the level of public discourse

@DoktorPandos Oh. Well in that cases the Adams’ could throw down with the best of them. John called Jefferson a half breed. And Quincy called Jackson an adulterer! (You knew that). 

But you’re student was right celebriticians are bad for the republic.
@ArsenalDem the critique here was that celebriticians are bad for the republic, & that modern politics is inhospitable to wiser leaders like Adams. So an A makes more sense here
